TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 、、、 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , , and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用类, 您可以检查由控件执行的数据操作的结果。 The class enables you to examine the results of data operations that have been performed by a control. 对象传递给控件的、 、、和事件的事件处理程序。 A object is passed to event handlers for the , , , , and events of the control. 如果数据操作成功完成, 则生成的数据对象存储在属性中 , 属性为`null`。If the data operation completed successfully, the resulting data object is stored in the property and the property is `null`. 如果数据操作失败, 则在数据操作过程中发生的异常将存储在属性中, 而属性为`null`。If the data operation failed, the exception that occurred during the data operation is stored in the property and the property is `null`. 如果处理了由属性表示的异常, 则将属性设置为`true` , 以便不会引发异常。If you handled the exception represented by the property, set the property to `true` so that the exception will not be thrown. 您可以通过属性检索查询返回的数据记录总数。You retrieve the total number of data records returned from a query through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序中, 如果属性为`null`, 则从属性中的对象检索产品 ID。In the event handler, if the property is `null`, the product ID is retrieved from the object in the property. Product ID 是表的主键, 由数据库进行设置, 因此, 在完成插入操作之前值是未知的。The product ID is a primary key for the table and is set by the database, therefore the value is not known until the insert operation has finished. 如果该属性不`null`等于, 则记录异常消息。The exception message is logged if the property is not equal to `null`. `true`然后将属性设置为。The property is then set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用数据操作所引发的异常初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an exception that occurred as a result of the data operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据操作过程中引发异常时, 将使用此构造函数。This constructor is used when an exception is thrown during the data operation. 属性自动设置为`null`。 The property is automatically set to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object result) cil managed

param.name: result
param.span: 包含数据操作结果数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the data that results from a data operation.

summary.span: 使用包含数据操作结果数据的对象初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an object that contains the data from the data operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在数据操作完成且未发生错误时使用。This constructor is used when the data operation has finished without an error. `result`参数包含一个对象, 该对象表示数据操作的结果。The `result` parameter contains an object that represents the result of the data operation. 属性自动设置为`null`。 The property is automatically set to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object result, int32 totalRowCount) cil managed

span.span: The number of rows that were returned from a data retrieval operation.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with an object that contains the data from the data operation and the number of rows returned.

summary.span: 获取在数据操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception that was thrown during the data operation.

value.span: 如果出现错误，则为表示异常的 对象；否则为 。

span.span: An object that represents the exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在数据操作过程中引发了异常, 则该异常将存储在属性中。If an exception is raised during the data operation, the exception is stored in the property. 可以为 、 、 、和事件创建事件处理程序, 并通过属性检索异常 (如果有)。 You can create event handlers for the , , , , and events and retrieve the exception, if any, through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序中, 如果属性为`null`, 则从属性中的对象检索产品 ID。In the event handler, if the property is `null`, the product ID is retrieved from the object in the property. 产品 ID 是表的主键, 由数据库进行设置, 因此在插入操作完成前, 值是未知的。The product ID is a primary key for the table and is set by the database, so the value is not known until the insert operation has finished. 如果该属性不`null`等于, 则记录异常消息。The exception message is logged if the property is not equal to `null`. `true`然后将属性设置为。The property is then set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示异常是否已得到处理而不该再次引发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.

value.span: 如果异常已得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以为、、 、和事件创建事件处理程序, 以检查这些操作期间发生的任何异常。 You can create event handlers for the , , , , and events to examine any exceptions that occurred during those operations. 如果处理异常, 而不希望再次引发异常, 则将属性设置为。 `true`If you handle the exception and do not want it to be thrown again, set the property to `true`. 如果未将属性设置为`true`, 则异常将传播到调用堆栈中的下一个事件处理程序。If you do not set the property to `true`, the exception will be propagated to the next event handler in the call stack. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序中, 如果属性为`null`, 则从属性中的对象检索产品 ID。In the event handler, if the property is `null`, the product ID is retrieved from the object in the property. Product ID 是表的主键, 由数据库进行设置, 因此, 在完成插入操作之前值是未知的。The product ID is a primary key for the table and is set by the database, therefore the value is not known until the insert operation has finished. 如果该属性不`null`等于, 则记录异常消息。The exception message is logged if the property is not equal to `null`. `true`然后将属性设置为。The property is then set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

public: property System::Object ^ Result { System::Object ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示数据操作结果的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the result of a data operation.

value.span: 包含数据操作结果数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the data from the data operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来检查从数据操作返回的值。You use the property to examine values returned from a data operation. 可以从数据操作检索输出参数, 或修改从查询返回的值。You can retrieve output parameters from a data operation or modify the values returned from a query. 存储在属性中的数据取决于已执行的数据操作的类型。The data stored in the property depends on the type of data operation that has been performed. 删除数据时, 属性包含属性中指定的类型的对象以及从数据源中删除的原始值。When you delete data, the property contains an object of the type specified in the property, with the original values that were deleted from the data source. 在插入或更新数据时, 属性包含在属性中指定的类型的对象, 其中包含已保存到数据源的新值。When you insert or update data, the property contains an object of the type specified in the property, with the new values that were saved to the data source. 选择数据时, 属性包含查询的结果。When you select data, the property contains the results of the query. 如果选择查询涉及到分组数据或从属性中指定的类型中选择属性的子集, 则属性将包含动态创建的类型的对象。If the select query involves grouping the data or selecting a subset of properties from the type specified in the property, the property contains an object of a dynamically created type. 否则, 属性包含属性中指定的类型的对象。Otherwise, the property contains an object of the type specified in the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序中, 如果属性为`null`, 则从属性中的对象检索产品 ID。In the event handler, if the property is `null`, the product ID is retrieved from the object in the property. Product ID 是表的主键, 由数据库进行设置, 因此, 在完成插入操作之前值是未知的。The product ID is a primary key for the table and is set by the database, therefore the value is not known until the insert operation has finished. 如果该属性不`null`等于, 则记录异常消息。The exception message is logged if the property is not equal to `null`. `true`然后将属性设置为。The property is then set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TotalRowCount As Integer
public: property int TotalRowCount { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取数据检索操作过程中在某个数据集中检索的总行数。

span.span: Gets the total number of rows in a data set from a data-retrieval operation.

value.span: 数据检索操作过程中在某个数据集中检索的总行数；如果 对象是在数据修改操作过程中创建的，则为 -1；如果通过将 设置为 并将 设置为 启用了自定义分页，则为 -1。

span.span: The total number of rows in a data set from the data retrieval operation; -1 if the object was created during a data modification operation; -1 if you enabled customized paging by setting to and by setting to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据检索操作过程中, 可以使用属性来获取数据集中的记录数。You use the property to get the number of records in the data set during a data retrieval operation. 通常, 在显示数据页时检索此属性, 并希望显示记录总数。Typically, you retrieve this property when you are displaying pages of data and want to show the total number of records. 数据分页时, 属性中的值可能与查询返回的实际行数不同。When data is being paged, the value in the property might be different from the actual number of rows that are returned by the query. 这是因为查询只返回该数据页所需的行数。This is because the query returns only the number of rows that are needed for that page of data. 仅当在事件的事件处理程序中对其进行访问时, 此属性才包含查询中的记录数。The property contains the number of records from a query only when it is accessed in an event handler for the event. 当从 、 、或事件的事件处理程序访问该属性时, 该属性将包含-1。When the property is accessed from an event handler for the , , , or event, the property contains -1. 属性的值取决于 控件的属性和`AllowPaging`数据绑定控件的属性。The value of the property depends on the property of the control, and on the `AllowPaging` property of the data-bound control. 下表汇总了属性的可能值。The following table summarizes the possible values for the property. |LinqDataSource 控件的 "自动页" 属性AutoPage Property of LinqDataSource control|数据绑定控件的 AllowPaging 属性AllowPaging Property of data-bound control|TotalRowCount 属性TotalRowCount property|结果Outcome| |-------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------|----------------------------|-------------| |`true`|`true`|查询的记录数。Number of records for a query.|数据自动分页。Data is automatically paged.| |`false`|`false`|查询的记录数。Number of records for a query.|数据未分页。Data is not paged.| |`true`|`false`|-1-1|数据未分页。Data is not paged.| |`false`|`true`|分配给事件的事件处理程序中的属性的值。The value that you assigned to the property in the event handler for the event.|数据会根据自定义分页时指定的值分页。Data is paged according to the values that you specified when you customized paging.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示包含控件 、控件和控件的网页。The following example shows a Web page with a control, a control, and a control. 控件定义事件的事件处理程序。 The control defines an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序的代码。The following example shows the code for the event handler for the event. 将属性的值分配给控件。The value of the property is assigned to the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount/cs/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount/vb/Default.aspx.vb#2)]
